TestDescription.name: JSP authentication bypass
TestDescription.Description: [coolbox][dark]Manual confirmation is required for this alert.[/dark][/coolbox][break] Your web application is restricting access to this .jsp file using Basic Authentication. It looks like Acunetix WVS managed to bypass this restriction by replacing the [bold].jsp[/bold] extension with [bold].jsp;.css[/bold].
TestDescription.Impact: An attacker can bypass the Basic Authentication and dirrectly access the restricted file(s).
TestDescription.Recommendation: Review your authentication rules and make sure that files that end with .jsp;.css cannot bypass the authentication.
